sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row
      class="d-flex justify-center"
    >
      <v-col
        md="4"
        sm="8"
        xs="12"
        :class="{
          'px-7 py-4': $vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
          'py-1': $vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
        }"
      >
        <v-form>
          <o-text
            sm
            semi-bold
            class="mb-3"
          >
            {{ ORDER_SUBTITLE }}
          </o-text>
          <header-title class="pb-4">
            {{ ORDER_TITLE }}
          </header-title>
          <o-text-field
            :title="ENTER_ORDER_ID"
            id="orderId"
            v-model="orderId"
            @onChange="onOrderChange($event)"
            @onKeyEnter="onNextClicked"
            :class="{ 'pb-3': $vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp }"
          />
          <action-button
            @click="onNextClicked"
            :class="{
              'mt-n3': $vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
              'mt-n2': $vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
            }"
            :disabled="isDisabled"
            :loading="isLoading"
            primary-color
            block
            x-large
          >
            {{ LOOKUP_ORDER }}
          </action-button>
        </v-form>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex'
import OTextField from '@/components/molecules/OTextField.vue'
import ActionButton from '@/components/atoms/ActionButton.vue'
import { validateOrderId } from '@/utils'
import { ORDER_LOOKUP, ZIP_CODE_LOOKUP } from 'branding/strings.json'
import OText from '@/components/atoms/OText.vue'
import HeaderTitle from '@/components/molecules/HeaderTitle.vue'

export default {
  components: {
    OTextField,
    ActionButton,
    OText,
    HeaderTitle
  },
  data () {
    return {
      orderId: '',
      isDisabled: true,
      customerSupportContact: '',
      ENTER_ORDER_ID: ORDER_LOOKUP.ENTER_ORDER_ID,
      ORDER_TITLE: ORDER_LOOKUP.ORDER_TITLE,
      ORDER_SUBTITLE: ORDER_LOOKUP.ORDER_SUBTITLE,
      LOOKUP_ORDER: ZIP_CODE_LOOKUP.LOOKUP_ORDER,
      RETURN_A_GIFT: ORDER_LOOKUP.RETURN_A_GIFT
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters({
      order: 'order/order',
      isLoading: 'order/isLoading',
      state_orderId: 'ui/orderId',
      config: 'returns/config'
    })
  },
  mounted () {
    this.orderId = this.state_orderId
    document.title = this.RETURN_A_GIFT
    this.validate()
  },
  methods: {
    validate () {
      this.isDisabled = !validateOrderId(this.orderId)
    },
    onOrderChange (event) {
      const value = event.target.value
      this.orderId = value
      this.validate()
    },
    async onNextClicked () {
      this.$store.commit('ui/updateOrderId', this.orderId)
      this.$router.push('/zipcode')
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.container {
  padding-top: 60px;
}
</style>
